WorkItem.Description:
When I do a new optimise after getting a new piece of gear, it would be very useful to get a list of the new gems & enchants you need to buy.   This could be listed just under the "Score after optimisation" something like: -
 
3x Fractured Cardinal Rubies
2x Deft Ametrines
1x Enchant Weapon: Beserking
1x Enchant Boots: Icewalker
1x Nerubian Leg Reinforcements
 
All this info is available on that screen, but when I am having to switch to various alts to buy/make the gems and enchants it would be convenient.     It would be fantastic if you got a summary of all the enchanting mats needed but I understand that may be a lot more work than its worth.     Nothing life-changing here, but it would be a nice convenience.

Comments.Message: Where is this Rawr3 you speak of?
Rawr3 is in a closed beta.  You can email Astrylian (his email address is posted on the Rawr homepage) to possibly get access.
